trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 Download and Installation of system requirements.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 Download and Installation of system requirements.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio provides cutting-edge tools and technologies to create apps that take advantage of the latest platform's capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio provides cutting-edge tools and technologies to create apps that take advantage of the latest platform's capabilities.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 also targets earlier platforms such as Windows 7 so you can create new apps or modernize existing apps that execute on earlier versions of Windows while leveraging the enhanced tools for quality development and team collaboration in Visual Studio 2015.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 also targets earlier platforms such as Windows 7 so you can create new apps or modernize existing apps that execute on earlier versions of Windows while leveraging the enhanced tools for quality development and team collaboration in Visual Studio 2015.

trans-unit.source:
Individual system requirements may vary due to the various framework requirements however minimal system requirements are:

Supported operating systems
trans-unit.target:
Individual system requirements may vary due to the various framework requirements however minimal system requirements are:

Supported operating systems

trans-unit.source: For Windows Store and Windows Universal app development
trans-unit.target: For Windows Store and Windows Universal app development

trans-unit.source: • Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1 and development require Windows 8.1 Update or later.
trans-unit.target: • Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1 and development require Windows 8.1 Update or later.

trans-unit.source: • Windows Phone 8.0 development requires Windows 8.1 Update (x64) or later.
trans-unit.target: • Windows Phone 8.0 development requires Windows 8.1 Update (x64) or later.

trans-unit.source: For emulator support (Windows or Android), Windows 8.1 (x64) Professional edition or later or Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise (x64) editions are required.
trans-unit.target: For emulator support (Windows or Android), Windows 8.1 (x64) Professional edition or later or Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise (x64) editions are required.

trans-unit.source: A processor that supports Client Hyper-V and Second Level Address Translation (SLAT) is also required.
trans-unit.target: A processor that supports Client Hyper-V and Second Level Address Translation (SLAT) is also required.

trans-unit.source: For more information, please visit: Visual Studio System Requirements.
trans-unit.target: For more information, please visit: Visual Studio System Requirements.
